Package triple.com

Class Client

java.lang.Object
triple.com.Client
public class Client extends Object
Represents a client in the system, with functionality to manage programs, goals, feedback, dietary preferences, and subscription plans.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructor to create a new Client object with the given client name and password.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(String clientName, String password)
      Constructor to create a new Client object with the given client name and password. This constructor initializes the client ID, sets the initial status as 'valid', subscribes the client to the basic plan, and adds the client to the database.
      Parameters:
      clientName - the name of the client
      password - the password for the client

      public String getClientId()

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)

    • enrollInProgram

      public void enrollInProgram(String programId)
      Enrolls the client in a program by its program ID. If the program is valid and the client is not already enrolled, the client will be added to the program's list of enrolled clients.
      Parameters:
      programId - the ID of the program to enroll the client in

    • setGoal

      public Progress setGoal(String goalType, double startValue, double targetValue)
      Sets a goal for the client with a specific goal type, starting value, and target value. The new goal is added to the client's progress list.
      Parameters:
      goalType - the type of the goal (e.g., weight loss, muscle gain)
      startValue - the starting value for the goal
      targetValue - the target value to achieve
      Returns:
      the created Progress object

    • setGoalForAProgram

      public void setGoalForAProgram(Progress progress)
      Adds a progress goal to the client's list of goals for a specific program.
      Parameters:
      progress - the Progress object to be added

    • displayGaolProgressIn

      public void displayGaolProgressIn(int goalNumber)
      Displays the progress summary of a specified goal based on its index in the goal list.
      Parameters:
      goalNumber - the index of the goal in the list

    • displayGoalProgress

      public void displayGoalProgress()
      Displays the progress summary for all of the client's goals. If no goals are set, a message indicating this is printed.

    • updateGoalProgress

      public Progress updateGoalProgress(int goalNumber, double newValue)
      Updates the progress of a specified goal by its index in the list. The new value is applied to the selected goal.
      Parameters:
      goalNumber - the index of the goal in the list
      newValue - the new value to update the goal's progress
      Returns:
      the updated Progress object

    • writeFeedback

      public void writeFeedback(String feedbackType, String message)
      Allows the client to provide feedback with a specified feedback type and message. The feedback is stored in the client's feedback list and also added to the database.
      Parameters:
      feedbackType - the type of feedback (e.g., complaint, suggestion, etc.)
      message - the feedback message

    • changeSubscription

      public void changeSubscription(PlanClient plan)
      Changes the client's subscription plan. The client's current plan is canceled, and the new plan is applied.
      Parameters:
      plan - the new PlanClient to subscribe the client to

    • deleteSubscription

      public void deleteSubscription()
      Cancels the client's current subscription and resets their plan to the basic plan.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • viewMessages

      public void viewMessages()

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(Message message)

    • getInbox

      public ArrayList<Message> getInbox()

    • replyToMessage

      public Message replyToMessage(Message originalMessage, String replyContent)
      Replies to an original message with the specified reply content. The reply message is sent to the original message sender ( instructor).
      Parameters:
      originalMessage - the message to reply to
      replyContent - the content of the reply
      Returns:
      the reply message

    • addDietaryPreference

      public void addDietaryPreference(String preference)
      Adds a dietary preference to the client's dietary preferences list. If the preference already exists, it will not be added again.
      Parameters:
      preference - the dietary preference to add

    • deleteDietaryPreference

      public void deleteDietaryPreference(String preference)
      Removes a dietary preference from the client's list. If the preference does not exist, a message will be displayed.
      Parameters:
      preference - the dietary preference to remove

    • getDietaryPreferences

      public ArrayList<String> getDietaryPreferences()
      Returns the list of the client's dietary preferences.
      Returns:
      the dietary preferences list

    • printDietaryPreferences

      public void printDietaryPreferences()
      Prints all of the client's dietary preferences if exist.

    • filterProgramsByDifficulty

      public ArrayList<Program> filterProgramsByDifficulty(String difficulty)
      Filters and returns a list of programs based on the specified difficulty.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty level ( Beginner Intermediate Advanced)
      Returns:
      a list of programs with the specified difficulty

    • filterProgramsByGoal

      public ArrayList<Program> filterProgramsByGoal(String goal)
      Filters and returns a list of programs based on the specified goal type.
      Parameters:
      goal - the goal type (e.g., "weight loss", "muscle gain")
      Returns:
      a list of programs with the specified goal

    • printPrograms

      public String printPrograms(ArrayList<Program> programs)
